title: Protip: Don't do all ranked climbing on the final 2 days
body:
https://i.imgur.com/Vurowf8.png?1[/img]

Anyway I'm green gold now. Highlights of the climb include a 8.1 million mastery point Riven (with 13,500 games in ranked since S3, or approximately 5.6 Riven games a day for 6 years), who did not know to use shield *before* damage and sucked at animation cancelling. An AP MF top (???), and me committing murder with Urgot. Ended up doing 25 games (3 remakes) in the past 2 days but got it.

Here's some miscellaneous memes ;3

https://i.imgur.com/lZYCiSH.png[/img]

https://i.imgur.com/aTyOEI2.png?1[/img]
